value:
$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$bEvBg_YggdrasillAsk|$Fi2000|$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hello there, Embla! It's rare for you
to visit me like this. What a day this
has turned out to be.$k$p$EFace_Cool2|Ah! Might I offer you refreshments?
This is a mortal beverage called tea,
and it is actually rather—$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|I am not interested. We have more
important matters to discuss.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Askr, you think too highly of mortals.
You give of yourself to the point
of exhaustion.$k$pIn the end, you will one day be
betrayed by those mortals...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Embla...$k$pThank you! It warms my heart
to hear how much you care.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|That is not—$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|I understand.$k$pBut I still want to believe in them.$k$pIf that means I am to be betrayed,
then so be it.$k$pI would rather hold on to my belief
in the goodness of mortals than
close my heart off in fear.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|Askr...$k$pI always knew we were different, but
it is only now I realize the extent.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Embla...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|

$WmMPID_開花チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Bloom01,Face|Thanks to Mar-Mar, I can be up
and about! No more sleeping.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It keeps getting darker... Where did
Embla go?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Normal2|We must go this way, everyone...$k$p$EFace_Cry|The darkness grows thicker,
which means...we are surely
headed toward Embla...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ash! A-are you going to make it?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|You've done enough, Ash. You ought
to get away from this darkness while
you're still able.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|I can manage a little longer... I will
be with you until the end...until we
can put a stop to all this.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|I exist for the benefit of the people.
This is what I must do.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Please, do not worry over me.
Think of your citizens, and of your
families... They are what matter.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|A-Ash!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|I used to think I stood apart, without
family or friends to care for...$k$p$EFace_Smile|But I have been blessed to find
myself a member of a huge family
I now hold so very dear.$k$p$EFace_Blush|And in being so blessed, I now know
mortals are beyond precious, you
with whom I've traveled especially.$k$pThe love I have for you all is nearly
overwhelming, as if it will burst
my very heart.$k$pIt is a feeling I want to hold on to.
I know that is what Lord Askr
would want.$k$p$EFace|So, I will be there, with you all,
until it's...all over. That is what
I choose.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Ash...$k$p$Sbs150|
